name: CometKaze
description:
A gravity-centered physics projectile puzzle game.  Part turn based strategy, part real-time defense game. Shoot Comets from a planet-sized cannon, across the solar system to destroy a target planet, before they destroy you. 50 levels, with a range of projectile types and obstacles.

This was the first game I worked on a few years ago, there are a couple audio and visual assets missing or temporary. These may be replaced in the near future, at which point I'll post an update here. 

Controls:

Up/Down arrow keys to aim

Space to fire

Numbers 1-5 to select projectile type, with additional space press to split fifth comet into smaller comets
